message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think you'll find it's worth a lot more than my asking price of $190.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $190 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now. I'm interested in the product, though. How about $140?  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $190 represents the value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $165 to make a deal happen today.
Alice, I'm really interested in this product, but $165 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $150.  Let's see if we can make this work.
